DOC.detailed_description: OUTLINE : This dose-escalation study IGART . Patients undergo IGART use active breathing control ( ABC ) 5 day week 7 week , total 33 fraction simultaneous integrated volume adapt boost ( SIVAB ) fraction 26-33 . Patients also receive paclitaxel intravenously ( IV ) 1 hour carboplatin IV 30 minute week 6 week . After completion study treatment , patient follow periodically 5 year .
